name: Chinchilla GO
description:
Chinchilla GO is a fast-paced action-platform shooter game with roguelite elements.

“What if we combine roguelike map, closed room battle, a bunch of powerful weapons, abilities and items into a single package?”

Development

Chinchilla GO is still in alpha state and in active development. Please consider giving us your feedback to help us improve the game. Any idea or suggestion is always welcome! :)
